mods.abstract: Hank Thompson radio show to promote his songbook on XELO, Ciudad Juárez, Chihuahua, Mexico; advertised as and with a mailing address of Clint, Texas. Labelled as series 1, program 1. Likely original broadcast date of 1950-03-27 (unconfirmed). Backed by his Brazos Valley Boys of Wade Wood on fiddle (mentioned), Lefty Nason on steel guitar (mentioned) and Billy Stewart on bass (presumably, not mentioned). Announcer at beginning referred to as Cousin Abner.
